SCTX:
begin Irano_note

short done
short doonce
short doonceB

if doonce = 0
	if ( GetDisabled = 0 )
		disable
		set doonce to 1
	endif
endif

if doonceB = 0
	if ( GetJournalIndex TR07_Guard >= 1 )
		enable
		set doonceB to 1
	endif
endif

if ( done == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( onactivate == 1 )

	Journal TR07_Guard 50
	set done to 1
	activate

endif

end
